message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique and valuable product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and personal life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $700000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business and personal life.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $650000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go up to $650000. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product to you for $675000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business and personal life.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $670000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $685000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my own needs.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I was thinking more along the lines of $680000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I've already compromised significantly, and I need to prioritize my own needs. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $690000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll need to consider other options.
I understand that you've compromised significantly, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to meet you at $682500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
